summary: Based on a story of Countess Bathory, a serial killer in 16th century Transylvania who supposedly killed hundreds of children.
cast: Svetlana Khodchenkova|Isabelle Allen|Lucas Bond|Ada Condeescu|Pavel Derevyanko|Lia Sinchevici|Claudiu Trandafir|Sandu Mihai Gruia|Paul Octavian Diaconescu|Alexandra Poiana|Valentin Teodosiu|Ioana Visalon|Vladimir Grosu|David Petcu
title: Lady of Csejte
